name: File Browser & Monaco Editor Integration
goal: Implement the file tree viewer and Monaco code editor with tab management

steps: Install @monaco-editor/react package
Install necessary type definitions
Verify package installation
Test basic Monaco import in a component

tasks.description: Create mock skill folder data structure
steps: Create src/data/mockSkillData.ts
Define TypeScript interfaces for FileNode and FolderStructure
Create sample Skill.md with skill description
Add sample JavaScript file (e.g., helpers.js)
Add sample Python file (e.g., script.py)
Add sample TypeScript file (e.g., types.ts)
Structure data with nested folders and files

tasks.description: Create FileTree component with expand/collapse functionality
steps: Create src/components/FileTree.tsx
Implement recursive tree rendering for nested folders
Add expand/collapse state management
Use ChevronRight and ChevronDown icons from lucide-react
Add Folder and File icons for visual distinction
Implement click handlers for folder expand/collapse
Implement click handlers for file selection
Style tree with proper indentation for nested items
Add hover states for interactive feedback
Create src/components/MonacoEditor.tsx
Import Editor from @monaco-editor/react
Configure dark theme (vs-dark)
Set up props for file content, language, and onChange handler
Implement language detection based on file extension
Configure editor options (line numbers, minimap, etc.)
Add loading state while Monaco initializes
Handle editor mount and instance management

tasks.description: Create TabManager component for multi-file editing
steps: Create src/components/TabManager.tsx
Define Tab interface with id, name, path, content, language
Implement tabs state management with useState
Create tab bar UI with horizontal scroll support
Add active tab highlighting
Implement tab close button (X icon)
Add click handler for tab switching
Style tabs to match IDE aesthetic
Handle empty state (no tabs open)
Create src/hooks/useFileManager.ts custom hook
Manage openTabs state array
Manage activeTabId state
Implement openFile function to add new tabs
Implement closeTab function to remove tabs
Implement switchTab function to change active tab
Prevent duplicate tabs for same file
Handle tab activation when opening existing file

tasks.description: Integrate all components in files page
steps: Update src/app/files/page.tsx
Import FileTree, TabManager, and MonacoEditor components
Use useFileManager hook for state management
Create two-column layout (tree on left, editor on right)
Wire FileTree onFileClick to openFile handler
Wire TabManager to tabs state and handlers
Wire MonacoEditor to active tab content
Add resizable splitter between tree and editor (optional stretch goal)
Style layout with proper spacing and borders

tasks.description: Test file opening and tab management workflow
steps: Test clicking a file in tree opens it in new tab
Test clicking same file twice doesn't create duplicate tab
Test switching between tabs shows correct content
Test closing tabs with X button
Test closing active tab switches to another tab
Test closing last tab shows empty state
Test opening multiple files creates multiple tabs
Verify tab order matches opening order

tasks.description: Verify syntax highlighting for different file types
steps: Open Skill.md file and verify markdown syntax highlighting
Open .js file and verify JavaScript syntax highlighting
Open .py file and verify Python syntax highlighting
Open .ts file and verify TypeScript syntax highlighting
Test that Monaco auto-detects language from file extension
Verify code folding works for supported languages
Test that typing in editor maintains syntax highlighting
Test typing in editor updates content
Test selection (click and drag)
Test undo (Cmd/Ctrl+Z)
Test redo (Cmd/Ctrl+Shift+Z)
Test cut/copy/paste
Test find (Cmd/Ctrl+F)
Test multi-cursor support (Cmd/Ctrl+D)
Verify all Monaco keybindings work as expected
Verify file tree scrolls properly with many files
Test tab bar scrolls horizontally with many tabs
Ensure proper contrast for file/folder icons
Check hover states provide clear feedback
Verify active tab is clearly distinguishable
Test layout works at different screen sizes
Ensure no layout shifts when opening/closing tabs
Check consistent spacing and alignment
Run npm run build
Verify build completes without errors
Check for TypeScript type errors
Run npm run lint
Verify no linting errors
Test application in development mode
Verify all Sprint 2 passing conditions are met
